name: Y Griega
description: Also known as simply “Y,” the 80% sativa Y Griega is an energizing strain with a sweet floral, citrus aroma. Unusual for a sativa variety, Y Griega produces large, resin-coated buds on tall stalks. This sativa cross between Amnesia Haze and Kali Mist delivers an energetic cerebral buzz followed by a long-lasting calm that soothes both mind and body. Y Griega’s high THC content makes it suitable for a variety of conditions including pain, inflammation, glaucoma, fatigue, and appetite loss. Growers won’t be disappointed with Y Griega’s yields, but its 85 to 95-day flowering time requires some devotion and patience.
descriptionPlain: Also known as simply “Y,” the 80% sativa Y Griega is an energizing strain with a sweet floral, citrus aroma. Unusual for a sativa variety, Y Griega produces large, resin-coated buds on tall stalks. This sativa cross between Amnesia Haze and Kali Mist delivers an energetic cerebral buzz followed by a long-lasting calm that soothes both mind and body. Y Griega’s high THC content makes it suitable for a variety of conditions including pain, inflammation, glaucoma, fatigue, and appetite loss. Growers won’t be disappointed with Y Griega’s yields, but its 85 to 95-day flowering time requires some devotion and patience.

highlightedReviews.text:
This medicine had brought some focus on the non linear world of why's and how's and seeing the relations between stuff-people and the planet. 

It was extraordinarily potent and distinctively deeper than any other medicine I've used. Body relaxation, but coupled with extreme clear questioning mind? that was psychedelic!

Fantastic mood improver and pain killer, highly recommended!
Perfect! Love this one. Very energetic seed!

articles.title: The First Annual Barcelona Social Clubs Cannabis Cup: And the Winners Are...
articles.author: Rebecca Kelley
articles.text:
Last month on March 23, Leafly was fortunate to sponsor Barcelona's first Social Clubs Cannabis Cup. It was an intimate gathering of about 500 attendees and 50 Cup entries, but as we all know, great things have small beginnings. The event itself took place at El Pueblo Español (or "Poble Espanyol"), a very cool "village museum" where each structure in the museum represents a village or town in Spain.

El Pueblo Español in Barcelona.
This visually-arresting video recaps the Social Clubs Cannabis Cup event, so if you want to dust off your high school Spanish (or if you're fluent), watch below:

Here are the Social Clubs Cannabis Cup winners broken down into the following categories: Best Indica, Best Sativa, Best Hash, and Best Concentrates. Congratulations to all of the winners! We expect next year's Cup to be an even greater success.
 
Top Indica Cannabis Strains
First Place: K-Lité Social Club with MK Ultra
Second Place: C Social Club with La Negra 44
Third Place: Senzi Club with Critical
 
Top Sativa Cannabis Strains
First Place: Choko Club with Chocolope
Second Place: Kush Bcn Club with Amnesia
Third Place: Resin Club with Diesel Tonic
 
Top Hash
First Place: Roots Club with ice-extraction Amnesia
Second Place: Sibaritas with ice-extraction White Widow
Third Place: Senzi Club with Somali
 
Top Concentrates
First Place: La Línea Verde with Y Griega shatter
Second Place: Padri Club with Tahoe Kush amber glass/shatter
Third Place: Kush Bcn with Devil Fruit budder
Poble Espanyol image credit: Wikipedia

articles.title: New Strains Alert: Cactus, Elderberry Kush, Fruit Spirit, Shiatsu Kush, and Y Griega
articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
This week, we’ve got five news strains that come from all over the world: Spain, Canada — even Japan. From Spain we have Elderberry Kush, Fruit Spirit, and Y Griega. Shiatsu Kush was brought from Japan and bred in Canada, where our new indica Cactus also originally hails from. Some of these strains have migrated far and wide, so if any of these have made their way to your neck of the woods, tell us all about it in a review!
  1. Cactus
Characteristics of Cactus:

75% indica
Cross between Afghani and Northern Lights
Breeder: Jordan of the Islands (Canada)
Earthy, woody, citrus aromas
Brings euphoric, relaxed, and focused effects
Good for pain, spasms and anxiety
	 

 2. Elderberry Kush
Characteristics of Elderberry Kush:

55% indica
Cross between Edelweiss #3 and Dojaberry
Breeder: Green Devil Genetics (Spain)
Flowers in 50 to 55 days
	 

 3. Fruit Spirit
Characteristics of Fruit Spirit:

60% sativa
Cross between Blueberry and White Widow
Breeder: Royal Queen Seeds (Spain)
Blueberry aroma
Delivers happy and relaxed effects
Helps some patients with mood disorders, anxiety, and depression
Flowers in 7 to 8 weeks
	 

 4. Shiatsu Kush
Characteristics of Shiatsu Kush:

Hybrid strain
From Amami Oshima, Japan and propagated by BC Bud Depot (Canada)
Pine, vanilla, and cedar aromas
Relaxes the mind and body
Used to relieve pain, tension, and stress
Flowers in 50 to 56 days
	 

 5. Y Griega
Characteristics of Y Griega:

80% sativa
Cross between Amnesia and Kali Mist
Sweet floral, and citrus aromas
Delivers an energetic cerebral buzz followed by a long-lasting calm
May help patients treat pain, inflammation, glaucoma, fatigue, and appetite loss
Flowers in 85 to 95 days

Growers won’t be disappointed with Y Griega’s yields, but its 85 to 95-day flowering time requires some devotion and patience.
